name: Coral Butterfly
description: The Sangacorexes' migratory patterns resemble those of butterflies.\nWhen they have almost finished converting the rampaging elemental energies in a certain area, the bone structure of the next generation of Sangacorexes will condense into wings of a sort. They will then fly through Enkanomiya, searching for a new place to live, grow, and multiply.\nInside the Realm Within, where there are no existential threats present, the flap of their wings is not quite as light as that of other butterflies, as if they are chasing some sort of memory...
